attributes.comment:
If raising the fee would help speed up the process then we are all for it. If
government offices would share information with eachother there would be no need
to increase fees. You would be able to decrease fees, because then we wouldn't
have the need for multiple back ground checks and multiple fingerprints through all
the different agencies. This would allow people to be able to get application's
processed quicker because the same information would be available through all
governemental agencies since the information would be shared. Our costs of
adopting would be lowered because we wouldn't be required to get our fingerprints
done 3 times, etc., etc.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
